类的使用
org.apache.http.auth.AuthScope

  • 使用AuthScope的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.http.auth
    Client HTTP authentication APIs.
    org.apache.http.client
    Client HTTP communication APIs.
    org.apache.http.client.fluent
    Simple facade APIs for HttpClient based on the concept of a fluent interface.
    org.apache.http.impl.auth.win
    Auth scheme that makes use of JNA to implement Negotiate and NTLM on Windows Platforms.
    org.apache.http.impl.client
    Default HTTP client implementation.

    • org.apache.http.auth中AuthScope的使用

      声明为AuthScope的org.apache.http.auth中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static AuthScope AuthScope.ANY
      Default scope matching any host, port, realm and authentication scheme.
      返回AuthScope的org.apache.http.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AuthScope AuthState.getAuthScope()
      已过时。 
      (4.2) do not use.
      参数类型为AuthScope的org.apache.http.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int AuthScope.match(AuthScope that)
      Tests if the authentication scopes match.
      void AuthState.setAuthScope(AuthScope authScope)
      已过时。 
      (4.2) do not use.
      参数类型为AuthScope的org.apache.http.auth中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AuthScope(AuthScope authscope)
      Creates a copy of the given credentials scope.

    • org.apache.http.client中AuthScope的使用

      参数类型为AuthScope的org.apache.http.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Credentials CredentialsProvider.getCredentials(AuthScope authscope)
      Get the credentials for the given authentication scope.
      void CredentialsProvider.setCredentials(AuthScope authscope, Credentials credentials)
      Sets the credentials for the given authentication scope.
